data.question: What is the publication year of the article discussing spin-antiferroelectric transitions?
Who is the corresponding author of the article on spin-antiferroelectric transitions?
What are the materials investigated in the study for evidence of a new type of spin-antiferroelectric transition?
What is the critical temperature (Tc) for the transition to a nonmagnetic singlet ground state for M = Zn?
What space group does Zn(pyz)V4O10 belong to at low temperature?
What is the primary effect of atomic displacements in the low-temperature structure of Zn(pyz)V4O10?
data.answer: Splitting of vanadium atoms into two symmetry-inequivalent positions

data.question: What is the significance of the charge-ordered vanadate layer in Zn(pyz)V4O10?
data.answer: It demonstrates a new charge-ordered structure that couples to the predominant spin-exchange pathways.

data.question: How does the incorporation of metal-organic layers affect the charge-ordered state in Zn(pyz)V4O10 compared to α-NaV2O5?
data.answer: It yields a distinctly new and better characterized charge ordering.

data.question: Why does Co(pyz)V4O10 suppress the spin-SAF transition?
data.answer: Due to the antiferromagnetic ordering of Co(pyz)2+ chains that frustrate the spin alignment on the vanadate ladder.

data.question: What is the role of metal-organic layers in tuning vanadate layer structures?
data.answer: They provide insights into the origins of magnetic phase transitions.

data.question: Is the transition temperature for M = Zn higher than 20 K?
Does the unit-cell volume of Co(pyz)V4O10 increase due to the transition?
Is the space group for Co(pyz)V4O10 at low temperature different from its higher temperature structure?
Are the antiferromagnetic spin-exchange interactions in Zn(pyz)V4O10 independent of the vanadate connectivity?
Does the structure of α-NaV2O5 result in equivalent antiferromagnetic exchange interactions to neighboring ladders?
Is the spin-SAF II structure in Zn(pyz)V4O10 a result of charge ordering both down and between ladders?
Does the incorporation of Co(pyz)2+ chains enhance the spin-SAF transition in Co(pyz)V4O10?
